title: MultiVersus Tier List
description: This is a tier list for the game MultiVersus. The list is divided into five tiers: S-Tier, A-Tier, B-Tier, C-Tier. S-Tier is the highest tier, and C-Tier is the lowest tier. The characters in each tier are ranked based on their overall strength and viability in the current meta. The tier list is intended to be a general guide, and the best character for you may vary depending on your playstyle and preferences.
heading: MultiVersus Tier List
introText: This is a tier list for the game MultiVersus. The list is divided into five tiers: S-Tier, A-Tier, B-Tier, C-Tier. S-Tier is the highest tier, and C-Tier is the lowest tier. The characters in each tier are ranked based on their overall strength and viability in the current meta. The tier list is intended to be a general guide, and the best character for you may vary depending on your playstyle and preferences.

data.itemDescription: Exceptional mobility, versatile attacks, and strong zoning abilities make Batman a top-tier character
High damage output, tricky movement, and versatile combos make Harley Quinn a formidable opponent
Powerful attacks, excellent survivability, and versatile aerial moves place Superman in the
Balanced abilities, strong defense, and effective crowd control make Wonder Woman a solid choice
Great zoning, creative attacks, and good escape options put Bugs Bunny in the
High damage potential, fast movement, and stealth abilities make Arya Stark a strong contender
Unique mechanics, strong ranged attacks, but requires high skill to master
Good survivability, decent damage output, but lacks the versatility of higher-tier characters
Strong melee attacks, good durability, but limited range options keep Garnet in the
Support abilities, decent defense, but lacks the offensive power of higher-tier characters
Good support and utility, but low damage output and survivability
Useful support skills, but limited offensive capabilities and low durability
